title: Diamond Chandbali Pendant - Adhunik Chandbali Bottu
features: A contemporary take on the traditional Chandbali design, this pendant features a crescent moon shape adorned with teardrop accents. The entire piece is encrusted with shimmering brilliant cut diamonds in a pave setting, maximizing brilliance. The rose gold finish adds warmth and a modern touch.
occasions: Perfect for a modern bride or to add a touch of elegance to any outfit. Suitable for weddings (vivaaham)
and formal events. Can also be worn for a festive occasion like Sankranthi or Diwali.
description: This pendant is a unique blend of tradition and contemporary design. The Chandbali motif has cultural significance, symbolizing femininity and prosperity. The brilliant-cut diamonds provide unparalleled sparkle, and the rose gold setting offers a modern and romantic appeal. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting luster.
